name: Commercial Electronics
tag_list: call-logging, interview-room-recording, call, logging, emergency, 911, call-center-solutions, call-center
overview:
Commercial Electronics provides reliable, customized recording system technology with customized service and proactive support. CEC installs and services equipment in virtually every industry that has a need for call recording, quality assurance monitoring, screen capture and call accounting.

Built on a foundation of service that goes back several decades, CEC takes the time to listen to our customers and provide the most efficient, economical and dependable solutions in call monitoring and recording equipment.

CEC serves major financial institutions, the transportation industry, 9-1-1 and public safety networks, interview rooms for law enforcement and other agencies, and numerous other inbound and outbound contact centers around the country.

Monitor. Record. Retrieve. CEC makes it simple. For products and services you can rely on every minute of every day.
